item.description:
Hollywood and the Paranormal

Community Room in the Trumbull Library

Many people over the years have wondered what, if any, truth there is to the way paranormal phenomena is represented in TV and movies. This program uses movie and TV clips , as well as evidence from the presenters' investigations, to compare the two. And you might be surprised to find how much truth there is in fiction!!!

Fun program presented by Smoking Gun Research Agency out of Westport. Time for Q&A and included.

Free.
Registration suggested.
I will take care of Registration for the Unknown Zone Meet Up Group.

www.trumbullct-library.org/

www.sgra-media.org


Directions from I 95 South
Take exit 38 towards Ct-15 Merritt and Wilbur Cross Pkwys
Merge onto Milford Pkwy
Take the exit onto CT - 15 S/Merritt Pkwy towards NYC
Take exit 50 for CT-127 towards Trumbull
Slight right at CT-127 / White Plains Rd.
Continue to follow CT-127
Turn left at Quality St.

Walk into the Main Entrance facing Quality St.
There is also a side entrance on the side of the fountain
but for these directions you are
Encouraged to use the front main entrance.
Do not go through the Sliding Doors going further into the Library.
Turn left going the direction towards the phone on the wall.
There are rest rooms on the left just before you go into the
Community room where the lecture will be.

To give even more of an idea where the Trumbull Library is, there is a Stop and
Shop Shopping Complex across the street up on a hill.
It is on the same side of the street as the Trumbull Town Hall.
If you go further down the Quality Street and take a left, that will put you on
Rt 111 Newtown Tnpk / Main Street. Rt 111 will take you to the Trumbull Mall

Because of Friday night traffic on October 5, to go to the
Warren lecture, I ended up taking 122 to 34 to 110 to 111
to 127 Quality Street.
For a ride break, there was a McDonalds on 111 not too far
Before the Trumbull Library.

The Trumbull Library and SGRA want me to send them a head count
A few days before the lecture. On 10/7, I did let SGRA know that I found
The conference room to be acceptable for their up coming lecture.

Please contact me if anyone wants to meet either in West Haven
For a ride or by the Trumbull Mall to follow before the lecture.

Maybes will be allowed up to October 19.
All Maybes will become No on October 20.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Hollywood and the Paranormal
